questions.question: Q1. What is the design goal of the observer?

answers.b: To cancel the steady state error

questions.question: Q2. A device that estimates the state variables is called _____.
Q3. What is the necessary condition for state observer design?

answers.a: All poles must be lies on the left half of the s plane
answers.b: Rank of the controllability matrix should be less than the order of the system

questions.question: Q4. If the state estimator observes all state variables of the system, it is called _____.
Q5. Transfer function is only applicable to which of the following?
